original_text: David's men said to him, ‘This is the day that the Lord told you about! The Lord said to you, “I will give your enemy to you. Then you can decide what is the right thing to do to him.” ’ So David stood up very quietly. He went and he cut off a small piece of cloth from Saul's coat. Saul did not know what had happened.
korean_text: 다윗의 사람들이 이르되 보소서 여호와께서 당신에게 이르시기를 내가 원수를 네 손에 넘기리니 네 생각에 좋은 대로 그에게 행하라 하시더니 이것이 그 날이니이다 하니 다윗이 일어나서 사울의 겉옷 자락을 가만히 베니라

sentences.original_text: This is the day that the Lord told you about
I will give your enemy to you
Then you can decide what is the right thing to do to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 당신은 그에게 무엇이 올바른 일인지 결정할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: So David stood up very quietly
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 다윗은 아무 말 없이 조용히 일어났습니다

sentences.original_text: He went and he cut off a small piece of cloth
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 가서 작은 천 조각을 잘라냈습니다

sentences.original_text: Saul did not know what had happened
sentences.korean_translation: 사울은 무슨 일이 일어났는지 알지 못했습니다
